message:
Update FatJarDetector.java

Make sure the jar archive it always close once the scan process has finished.
Otherwise the following issue happen (only in Windows environment)
 Failed to execute goal io.fabric8:fabric8-maven-plugin:3.5.33:build (default) on project app-sample: Execution default of goal io.fabric8:fabric8-maven-plugin:3.5.33:build failed: Cannot extract generator config: org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException: Failed to add devtools files to fat jar C:\tmp\app-sample\target\app-sample-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar. java.io.IOException: Failed to delete original file 'C:\tmp\app-sample\target\app-sample-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar' after copy to 'C:\TEMP\user1\app-sample-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar6705264538840591172.tmp'
